application_type_full: Tree works: Trees in conservation areas/subject to TPOs
description: T2	Chilean Bellflower By Main Building	20% Crown Reduction - Reducing the height and spread of the tree by approximately 1-2m, to tidy and contain and retain furnishing growth. Final height = 7m and final spread = 4mT3	Blue Atlas Cedar (Cedrus atlantica 'glauca') By Bin Store - Lightly reduce to rebalance. Final height = 14m and final spread = 8mT4	False Acacia (Robinia pseudoacacia) Over Broom Road	- Crown Lift to provide 3m clearance from ground level. Final height 10m and spread 5m.	T5	Dying Maple - Adj Broom Water West - Fell to ground level.T7	Cypress with Dead Top - By Broom Water West - 20% Crown Reduction - Reducing the height and spread of the tree by approximately 1-2m, to tidy and contain and retain furnishing growth. Final height = 8m and final spread = 4mT11	Cherry Row - By Pool - Crown lift central avenue, to form arch. Final height = 4m and final spread = 2m12 Cedar - Final height = 18m and final spread = 9m
